title: How to mount your Curved TV with the SANUS Swivel Mount
description:
Our easy step-by-step instructions for installing your Curved TV on the wall with the SANUS Swivel Mount: VLC1. This mount was designed specifically for use with today’s 4K Ultra HD curved TVs 40”-88” and up to 150 lbs.

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of SANUS TV & Speaker Mounts. Shop for the SANUS Swivel Mount at Abt today!
